text: Ahaziah died just as the Lord had said through Elijah. Because he had no son, Joram1:17. “Joram,” spelled here Jehoram. For purposes of clarity the king of Israel is called Joram in this translation, while the king of Judah is called Jehoram, though the names are basically the same and are used interchangeably in the Hebrew text. succeeded him as king in the second year of the reign of Jehoram, son of Jehoshaphat, king of Judah.
